column1: Incomplete, inappropriate for the set task
column2: Minimum requirements not met; glaring errors (wrong analysis, sections missing, etc.)
column3: Minimum requirements barely met, some missed out; major errors in understanding or execution
column4: Minimum requirements all met or attempted; some errors in understanding or execution
column5: Minimum requirements all met, some done quite well; few errors in understanding or execution
column6: Minimum requirements addressed thoroughly and competently; clarity and depth of understanding and insight
column7: Impeccable analysis and presentation; creative or unusual new ideas with wide-ranging evidence; above and beyond the minimum requirements
